alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Elmore; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 12:52AM CDT until March 26 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elmore County in east central Alabama... West central Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... Southeastern Coosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1252 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Speed, or near Equality, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Equality, Jacksons` Gap, Speed, Eastern Lake Martin, Cottage Grove, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Highway 9 and Highway 22, Nixburg, Kowaliga Bridge, Wind Creek State Park, Southern Lake Martin, Fishpond, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Ray and Dare Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
